name: Wrath of Kitty (2014)
description:
Created at the Jolly Dublin GameCraft in December 2014 in 10 hours, originally made in Unity 4.6.1 and rebuilt in Unity 2018, so might be some weirdness!

Controls:

Left and Right arrows for Kitty Movement
Space for jumping
A, B, X, Y for battling

Created by:

Clare Byrne
Nuala Treanor
Mattew Shaw
Mel Daylan
Shane O'Brien
